full_summary:
# Architecture Services Omnibus - Request for Proposal

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01027764
* **Solicitation Number:** 20222363
* **Publication Date:** February 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 24, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** TBA
* **Expected Contract End Date:** TBA

## Service Provision

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) for the following streams:

* Stream 1: Applications Services
* Stream 3: Information Management/Information Technology Services
* Stream 5: Project Management Services
* Stream 6: Cyber Protection Services

Services will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR) and Greater Toronto Area (GTA).

## Security Requirements

Minimum corporate security required is Designated Organization Screening (DOS), and minimum resource security required is Reliability Status.

## Tender Description

OSFI requires services for architecture in the following areas:

* A.1 Application/Software Architect
* P.2 Enterprise Architect
* I.5 IM Architect (Data Architect)
* I.11 Technology Architect
* C.7 Information Technology Security Design Specialist

## Contract Duration

The contract period will be from the date of contract award to two years, with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to two additional one-year periods.

## Suitability Requirements

Bidders must have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region and Greater Toronto Area (GTA) for the specified streams.

## Authorized Agents

Authorized agents for this solicitation are:

* Aleksandra Green, Contracting Officer
* contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca

## Inquiries

Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority named above.

Please note that this is a selective tendering process, and bidders are expected to meet the requirements outlined in the tender document.
